name: java4bpel
body:
# java4bpel
***

java4bpel is an extension for Apache ODE and WSO2 BPS. java4bpel introduces new BPEL extension activity called invokeClass, which can be used to invoke a JAVA class within a BPEL process.

**Project home page**

https://github.com/hasithaa/java4bpel

**Clone project from** 

https://github.com/hasithaa/java4bpel.git
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
